metadata.scraper_type: 最終版手動操作風格爬蟲
metadata.operation_flow: 輸入單字 → 選擇用例 → 擷取三要素 → 儲存管理

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 你明仔載欲紮飯包無？
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Lí bîn-á-tsài beh tsah pn̄g-pau--bô
successful_records.chinese_translation: 你明天要帶便當嗎？
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 若講著鵝肉冬粉料理，我就會流喙瀾。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Nā kóng-tio̍h gô-bah tang-hún liāu-lí, guá tō ē lâu tshuì-nuā.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 若談到鵝肉冬粉料理，我就會流口水。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 豬跤𤉙爛爛，真好食。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Ti-kha kûn nuā-nuā, tsin hó-tsia̍h.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 豬腳煮得爛爛的，真好吃。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 我欲來去市場買一塊豬肝。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Guá beh lâi-khì tshī-tiûnn bé tsi̍t tè ti-kuann.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 我要到市埸買一塊豬肝。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 屏東的高樹出產棗仔。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Pîn-tong ê Ko-tshiū tshut-sán tsó-á.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 屏東高樹出產棗子。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 較早作田人攏放伴割稻仔，人若來鬥相共，愛攢三頓佮點心予人食，閣袂使驚人大食。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Khah-tsá tsoh-tshân-lâng lóng pàng-phuānn kuah-tiū-á, lâng nā lâi tàu-sann-kāng, ài tshuân sann tǹg kah tiám-sim hōo lâng tsia̍h, koh bē-sái kiann lâng tuā-tsia̍h.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 從前農人都輪流協助割稻子，人家如果來幫忙，要準備三餐跟點心給人家吃，還不能怕人家食量大。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 牛犅𨂿會損蕩柑仔欉、柳丁欉、檸檬欉佮木瓜欉等果子欉。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Gû-káng-uainnh ē sńg-tn̄g kam-á tsâng, liú-ting tsâng, lê-bóng tsâng kah bo̍k-kue tsâng tíng kué-tsí tsâng.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 天牛會危害橘子、柳丁、檸檬和木瓜樹等果樹。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 我的紅茶無愛摻糖。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Guá ê âng-tê bô ài tsham thn̂g.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 我的紅茶不要加糖。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 卵、牛奶、肉類、豆仔類是咱人的食食當中重要的卵白質來源。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Nn̄g, gû-ling, bah-luī, tāu-á-luī sī lán-lâng ê tsia̍h-si̍t tang-tiong tiōng-iàu ê nn̄g-pe̍h-tsit lâi-guân
successful_records.chinese_translation: 蛋、牛奶、肉類、豆類是吾人的食物當中重要的蛋白質來源
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 牛犅𨂿會損蕩柑仔欉、柳丁欉、檸檬欉佮木瓜欉等果子欉。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Gû-káng-uainnh ē sńg-tn̄g kam-á tsâng, liú-ting tsâng, lê-bóng tsâng kah bo̍k-kue tsâng tíng kué-tsí tsâng.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 天牛會危害橘子、柳丁、檸檬和木瓜樹等果樹。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 這改比賽去予對方修理甲塗塗塗，佇檢討會裡，教練予人檢討半點鐘，會使講是「滿面專豆花」。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Tsit kái pí-sài khì hōo tuì-hong siu-lí kah thôo-thôo-thôo, tī kiám-thó-huē--lí, kàu-liān hōo lâng kiám-thó puànn tiám-tsing, ē-sái kóng sī “muá-bīn tsuan tāu-hue”.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 這次比賽被對方修理得慘兮兮，在檢討會中，教練被人檢討了半個小時，可以說是「狼狽不堪」。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 最近我搬來庄跤蹛，若有好食物，我就捾去送厝邊。𪜶嘛定定送𪜶家己種的青菜、果子來予我。人講「千金買厝，萬金買厝邊」，咱著佮厝邊頭尾好好仔交陪！
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Tsuè-kīn guá puann-lâi tsng-kha tuà, nā ū hó-tsia̍h mi̍h, guá tō kuānn-khì sàng tshù-pinn. In mā tiānn-tiānn sàng in ka-kī tsìng ê tshenn-tshài, kué-tsí lâi hōo--guá. Lâng kóng “tshian-kim bé tshù, bān kim bé tshù-pinn”, lán tio̍h kah tshù-pinn-thâu-bué hó-hó-á kau-puê!。他們也常常送他們自己種的蔬菜、水果給我。人家說：「千金買屋，萬金買鄰」，我們得跟鄰居好好交往！
successful_records.chinese_translation: 最近我搬到鄉下住，若有好吃的食物，我就拿去送給隔壁鄰居。他們也常常送他們自己種的蔬菜、水果給我。人家說：「千金買屋，萬金買鄰」，我們得跟鄰居好好交往！
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 阮阿公上愛食豆乾。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Guán a-kong siōng ài tsia̍h tāu-kuann.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 我爺爺最喜歡吃豆干。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 伊做茶米的中盤欲成十冬矣。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: I tsò tê-bí ê tiong-puânn beh tsiânn tsa̍p tang--ah.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 他從事茶葉的中盤生意快十年了。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 在生食一粒塗豆，較贏死了拜一个豬頭。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Tsāi-senn tsia̍h tsi̍t lia̍p thôo-tāu, khah iânn sí-liáu pài tsi̍t ê ti-thâu.。意思是說為人子女應及時孝敬父母，而非等父母死後才隆重祭拜。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 在世時拿一顆花生孝敬，好過死後用一顆豬頭祭拜。意思是說為人子女應及時孝敬父母，而非等父母死後才隆重祭拜。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 鹹酸甜食起來酸甘甜仔酸甘甜。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Kiâm-sng-tinn tsia̍h--khí-lâi sng-kam-tinn-á-sng-kam-tinn.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 蜜餞吃起來的味道是酸中帶甜。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 麻糍做好愛糝粉才袂黏做伙。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Muâ-tsî tsò-hó ài sám-hún tsiah bē liâm tsò-hué.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 麻糬做好後要撒粉才不會黏在一起。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 阮阿母已經九十歲矣，煞變做愛食糖仔閣愛共我司奶，真正是「老人囡仔性」。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Guán a-bú í-king káu-tsa̍p huè--ah, suah piàn-tsò ài tsia̍h thn̂g-á koh ài kā guá sai-nai, tsin-tsiànn sī “lāu-lâng gín-á-sìng”.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 我媽媽已經九十歲了，竟變得喜歡吃糖果又愛跟我撒嬌，真的是「老人孩子氣」。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 阿母講伊細漢的時，攏會佇庄跤舊厝的外埕，共𪜶阿舅鬥曝粟仔。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: A-bú kóng i sè-hàn ê sî, lóng ē tī tsng-kha kū-tshù ê guā-tiânn, kā in a-kū tàu pha̍k tshik-á.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 媽媽說他小時候，都會在鄉下古厝的外面的空地，幫他舅舅曬稻穀。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 凡若麵粉做的我攏真有路，特別是麵粉粿仔我上愛食。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Huān-nā mī-hún tsò--ê guá lóng tsin ū-lōo, ti̍k-pia̍t sī mī-hún-kué-á guá siōng ài tsia̍h.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 凡是麵粉做的食物都是我喜愛的類型，尤其麵疙瘩是我最愛吃的。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 猶未咖哩嗹囉咧。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Iáu-buē ka-lí-liân-lô--leh.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 八字還沒一撇呢。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 伊食火鍋搵料愛濫醋、蒜茸、番薑仔、蔥仔、豆乳、香油，伊講愛較厚味才會好食。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: I tsia̍h hué-ko ùn-liāu ài lām tshòo, suàn-jiông, huan-kiunn-á, tshang-á, tāu-jú, hiang-iû, i kóng ài khah kāu-bī tsiah ē hó-tsia̍h.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 他吃火鍋沾醬要摻雜醋、蒜泥、辣椒、蔥、豆腐乳、香油，他說要五味俱全才會好吃。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 用雞卵清做雞卵糕。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Īng ke-nn̄g-tshing tsò ke-nn̄g-ko.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 用雞蛋的蛋白製做蛋糕。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 有疼風的人愛忌喙，腹內、蚶仔佮蚵仔較莫食咧。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Ū thiànn-hong ê lâng ài khī-tshuì, pak-lāi, ham-á kah ô-á khah mài tsia̍h--leh.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 患有痛風的人要忌口，內臟、蛤蜊、牡蠣盡量不要吃。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 「王梨頭，西瓜尾」是咧講王梨是倚蒂頭的所在上蓋甜，西瓜顛倒是離蒂頭上遠的彼爿較甜，欲食的時先食較無甜的彼爿就會愈食愈甜。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: “Ông-lâi thâu, si-kue bué” sī teh kóng ông-lâi sī uá tì-thâu ê sóo-tsāi siōng-kài tinn, si-kue tian-tò sī lī tì-thâu siōng hn̄g ê hit pîng khah tinn, beh tsia̍h ê sî sing tsia̍h khah bô tinn ê hit pîng tō ē jú tsia̍h jú tinn.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 「鳳梨頭，西瓜尾」是說鳳梨最甜的地方是靠近基根底部的那頭，西瓜反而是離蒂頭最遠端的那邊最甜，要吃的時候先吃比較不甜的那邊就會越吃越甜。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 伊拄對銀行領錢出來，雄雄一个強徒出手共伊的皮包仔搶去。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: I tú tuì gîn-hâng niá tsînn tshut--lâi, hiông-hiông tsi̍t ê kiông-tôo tshut-tshiú kā i ê phuê-pau-á tshiúnn--khì.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 他剛從銀行領錢出來，突然一個搶匪動手搶走了他的皮包。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 阿媽佇田裡拍菜股，一股一股的菜蔬攏成做飯桌頂的好料理。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: A-má tī tshân--lí phah tshài-kóo, tsi̍t kóo tsi̍t kóo ê tshài-se lóng tsiânn-tsò pn̄g-toh-tíng ê hó liāu-lí.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 奶奶在田裏面築造菜畦，一畦一畦的青菜都成了飯桌上的好菜色。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 伊雖然穿插若庄跤倯咧，毋過泅水、拍球、唱歌、演奏樂器逐項會，真正是「烏矸仔貯豆油」，予人看袂出。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: I sui-jiân tshīng-tshah ná tsng-kha-sông--leh, m̄-koh siû-tsuí, phah-kiû, tshiùnn-kua, ián-tsàu ga̍k-khì ta̍k hāng ē, tsin-tsiànn sī “oo kan-á té tāu-iû”, hōo lâng khuànn bē tshut.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 他雖然衣著打扮像鄉巴佬，不過游泳、打球、唱歌、演奏樂器樣樣會，真是「黑色罐子裝上醬油」，讓人看不出來。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 做人著愛知影家己有幾兩重，毋通臭煬閣愛歕雞胿，若無，就會予人笑講是「大紅花毋知䆀，圓仔花䆀毋知」。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Tsò-lâng tio̍h-ài tsai-iánn ka-kī ū kuí niú tāng, m̄-thang tshàu-iāng koh ài pûn-ke-kui, nā-bô, tō ē hōo lâng tshiò kóng sī “tuā-âng-hue m̄ tsai bái, înn-á-hue bái m̄ tsai”.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 為人得明白自己的實力如何，不要太臭屁又喜歡說大話，否則，就會被人嘲笑「馬不知臉長」。
successful_records.source_word: 大紅花毋知䆀，圓仔花䆀毋知。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 精肉豉好，滒魚漿落去煠，就是咱咧食的肉羹。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Tsiann-bah sīnn hó, kō hî-tsiunn lo̍h-khì sa̍h, tō sī lán teh tsia̍h ê bah-kenn.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 瘦肉醃過，裹魚漿在熱水裡煮熟，就是我們吃的肉羮。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 這間冰店攏用在地清氣的山泉水佮各種口味的果子來做霜仔枝。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Tsit king ping-tiàm lóng iōng tsāi-tē tshing-khì ê suann-tsuânn-tsuí kah kok-tsióng kháu-bī ê kué-tsí lâi tsò sng-á-ki.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 這家冰店都用在地乾淨的山泉水及各種口味的水果製作冰棒。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 人送油飯予咱，咱愛硩米還人。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Lâng sàng iû-pn̄g hōo--lán, lán ài teh bí hîng--lâng.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 人家送油飯給我們，我們要用米回禮。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 會曉煮雜菜麵的麵擔仔愈來愈少矣。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Ē-hiáu tsú tsa̍p-tshài-mī ê mī-tànn-á jú lâi jú tsió--ah.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 懂得煮什錦麵的麵攤越來越少了。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 有真濟人會佇肉粽節彼工的正中晝，共生雞卵𫞼佇塗跤兜。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Ū tsin tsē lâng ē tī Bah-tsàng-tseh hit kang ê tsiànn-tiong-tàu, kā tshenn ke-nn̄g tshāi tī thôo-kha-tau.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 有很多人在端午節那天正午時分，把生雞蛋立在地上。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 食桃仔食甲湯㴙㴙滴。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Tsia̍h thô-á tsia̍h kah thng tsha̍p-tsha̍p-tih.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 吃桃子吃得湯汁直滴。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 若講著鵝肉冬粉料理，我就會流喙瀾。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Nā kóng-tio̍h gô-bah tang-hún liāu-lí, guá tō ē lâu tshuì-nuā.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 若談到鵝肉冬粉料理，我就會流口水。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 規間店的泡麵掃了了。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Kui king tiàm ê phàu-mī sàu-liáu-liáu.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 整家店的泡麵買光光。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 阮兜巷仔口彼擔臭豆腐，食過的人攏「呵咾甲會觸舌」。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Guán tau hāng-á-kháu hit tànn tshàu-tāu-hū, tsia̍h--kuè ê lâng lóng “o-ló kah ē tak-tsi̍h”.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 我家巷口的那攤臭豆腐，吃過的人都「讚美有加」。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 你毋通閣提雞卵糕來，我已經飫喙矣。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Lí m̄-thang koh the̍h ke-nn̄g-ko lâi, guá í-king uì-tshuì--ah.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 你不要再拿蛋糕來，我已經吃膩了。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 煙腸用烘的較好食。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Ian-tshiâng iōng hang--ê khah hó-tsia̍h.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 香腸用烤的比較好吃。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 食一碗礤冰，涼一下。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Tsia̍h tsi̍t uánn tshuah-ping, liâng--tsi̍t-ē.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 吃一碗刨冰，清涼一下。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 煮麻油雞一定愛先用薑母落去炒。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Tsú muâ-iû-ke it-tīng ài sing īng kiunn-bó lo̍h-khì tshá.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 煮麻油雞一定要先用老薑炒過。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 阮牽手當咧無閒的時陣，我家婆講欲替伊煎一盤菜脯卵請人客，盍會知影「好好鱟刣甲屎那流」，煞煎甲臭火焦兼著火。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Guán khan-tshiú tng-teh bô-îng ê sî-tsūn, guá ke-pô kóng beh thè i tsian tsi̍t puânn tshài-póo-nn̄g tshiánn lâng-kheh, khah ē tsai-iánn “hó-hó hāu thâi kah sái ná lâu”, suah tsian kah tshàu-hué-ta kiam to̍h-hué.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 內人正忙的時候，我多管閒事主動要替他煎一盤蘿蔔乾炒蛋給客人吃，哪裡知道「成事不足，敗事有餘」，竟然炒得焦黑不堪。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 煮菜摻味素粉較有氣味。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Tsú tshài tsham bī-sòo-hún khah ū khì-bī.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 煮菜加味精會比較有味道。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 伊駛車進前有啉燒酒閣駛傷緊，才會發生車禍。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: I sái-tshia tsìn-tsîng ū lim sio-tsiú koh sái siunn kín, tsiah ē huat-sing tshia-hō.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 他開車前有喝酒，加上開太快，才會發生車禍。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 用碗頭仔啉米酒。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Iōng uánn-thâu-á lim bí-tsiú.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 用小碗喝米酒。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 食杏仁茶配油炸粿。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Tsia̍h hīng-jîn-tê phuè iû-tsia̍h-kué.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 喝杏仁茶配油條。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 咱巷仔口彼个陳董的閣去自助餐買便當來食矣，枉費伊大某、細姨媠噹噹，厝內煞定定冤家量債，無人欲煮予食。莫怪人講：「一某無人知，兩某相卸代。」
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Lán hāng-á-kháu hit ê Tân-táng--ê koh khì tsū-tsōo-tshan bé piān-tong lâi tsia̍h--ah, óng-huì i tuā-bóo, sè-î suí-tang-tang, tshù-lāi suah tiānn-tiānn uan-ke-niû-tsè, bô lâng beh tsú hōo tsia̍h. Bo̍k-kuài lâng kóng, “Tsi̍t bóo bô lâng tsai, nn̄g bóo sio-sià-tāi.”。難怪人家說：「一夫一妻，夫唱婦隨；家有妻妾，雞犬不寧。」
successful_records.chinese_translation: 住巷口的陳董事長又去自助餐買便當來吃了，虧他有老婆、姨太太而且都很漂亮，家裡卻常常爭吵，沒人做飯給他吃。難怪人家說：「一夫一妻，夫唱婦隨；家有妻妾，雞犬不寧。」
successful_records.source_word: 一某無人知，兩某相卸代。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 想欲食金瓜湯，煞規菜市仔攏無人咧賣金瓜，「無魚，蝦嘛好」，今仔日先買冬瓜轉來去𤉙排骨湯。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Siūnn-beh tsia̍h kim-kue-thng, suah kui tshài-tshī-á lóng bô lâng teh bē kim-kue, “bô hî, hê mā hó”, kin-á-ji̍t sing bé tang-kue tńg lâi-khì kûn pâi-kut-thng.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 想喝南瓜湯，整個菜市場卻沒有人賣南瓜，「退而求其次」，今天先買冬瓜回家煮排骨湯。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 煮菜摻味素粉較有氣味。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Tsú tshài tsham bī-sòo-hún khah ū khì-bī.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 煮菜加味精會比較有味道。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 三月三，桃仔李仔伨頭擔。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Sann-gue̍h-sann, thô-á lí-á thīn-thâu tann.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 農曆三月，以成擔方式挑著盛產的桃子、李子。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 熱天時仔麥仔酒、汽水是𥴊仔店的大色貨。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Jua̍h-thinn-sî-á be̍h-á-tsiú, khì-tsuí sī kám-á-tiàm ê tuā-sik-huè.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 夏天的時候啤酒、汽水是雜貨店的主要商品。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 苦楝舅春天的新葉是笑青色，開花是黃色，漸漸轉紅，結子的時閣變咖啡色，所以嘛予人叫做四色樹。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: Khóo-līng-kū tshun-thinn ê sin hio̍h sī tshiò-tshenn-sik, khui-hue sī n̂g-sik, tsiām-tsiām tńg-âng, kiat-tsí ê sî koh piàn ka-pi-sik, sóo-í mā hōo lâng kiò-tsò sì-sik-tshiū.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 臺灣欒樹春天的新葉是嫩綠色，開花是黃色，漸漸轉紅，結果時又變成褐色，所以也被人稱為四色樹。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典

successful_records.taiwanese_sentence: 阿明共阿兄討拄買來的四秀仔，閣共阿姊討比賽贏來的獎品，就去予阿媽共罵講「目睭掛斗概，看人物就愛」。
successful_records.tailo_pronunciation: A-bîng kā a-hiann thó tú bé--lâi ê sì-siù-á, koh kā a-tsí thó pí-sài iânn--lâi ê tsióng-phín, tō khì hōo a-má kā mē kóng “ba̍k-tsiu kuà táu-kài, khuànn lâng mi̍h tō ài”.。
successful_records.chinese_translation: 阿明向哥哥要剛買來的零食，又向姊姊要比賽贏得的獎品，所以就被祖母斥責「眼睛掛著平斗的木概，看到別人的東西就想要」。
successful_records.source_word: 目睭掛斗概，看人物就愛。
successful_records.source: 教育部臺灣台語常用詞辭典
